name: An Angel's Guide
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam #70

Hello everyone! 

In this game, you play as a self-writing book that gives commands to two angels to get to a portal. Each angel can only read from one side of the book, and an entire page must be filled before flipping to the next one.  Click on the library button to input commands. Once both pages fill, you can flip the page. The orientation may be a bit confusing but refer to the compass given on each stage and in the help section for more info.

All of the levels are possible, but some require some clever tricks.

This is my first jam. I tried to come up with at least a semi-new concept and create all the assets myself, which may or may not have been the right decision (probably not).

WebGL can be a bit weird with graphics, but hopefully it works.
